page.title: 17ONGAR - SURVEY RESULTS
page.content:
We conducted a survey of 210 people. 90% of people surveyed owned their own house and the other 10% rented their houses. In all 65% have lived in Ongar all their lives.49 people moved there because of jobs, 40 because they liked the area, 26 because they liked the house and 59 had other reasons.Almost half these people interviewed moved to Ongar from the Greater London area. 108 work in Ongar or the local area. 74 work between Ongar and central London. 68 work in Central London. 39 work in Harlow, Brentwood or Chelmsford. 27 work in other areas.
19 get to work on foot or by Cycle. 135 get to work by car. 23 by tube. {cont.on page 18
